name: Drag Expand
description:
Drag everything open to find the hidden password! There is a small reward at the end...

The constraint I put on this project, was that it had to be 1 screen and that only GUI could be used, because I wanted to learn that. With that I created something quite unique I think, so I have no idea what people will think of the interaction. Therefore, the graphics are mostly functional. Besides that, by interacting with the game you can get a feel of how Godot handles resizing with containers.

Part of the GoGodot Jam with the theme "Growth", which I interpreted as the expand property for GUI Containers, which I ended up combing with SplitContainers.
